extensionDescription.message: Select a tab to refresh every x minutes (you can set in the preferences, the default is 3 minutes), thus preventing the timeout on the page you are connected to.

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider making a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

works.message: Using this Add-on you can set the time in minutes for the refresh page, it is possible to do this by adjusting in the preferences going in about:addons or by clicking on the gear in the top right corner. It works by refreshing the page every x minutes so that you don't be disconnected in the login timeout. This Add-on will have more updates that will add new features, as requested in the reviews. Currently has the following features:

aboutItem1.message: 1. Set time to refresh tab in Add-on preferences

aboutItem3.message: 3. Does not refresh the page you are using

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this Add-on: Please create a new issue.

update_page.message: Do not refresh the tab if you are using

description_update_page.message: Do not refresh the tab if it is being used

description_contextmenu.message: Allow or not the Context menu

description_timer.message: Sets the time to refresh the page
